title: Was Malia Obama Arrested in an ‘Antifa Attack’ on an Elderly Woman?
subtitle: Members of anti-fascist groups (popularly called "antifa") did not attack an elderly woman, and Malia Obama was not arrested in connection with the imaginary altercation.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Members of antifa groups attacked an elderly woman and Malia Obama was arrested in connection with the incident.
